primaryAttributes.name: Health
primaryAttributes.description: Death awaits when it falls to 0. Taking damage can also leave the unit wounded. Beware: Health is only partially restored every morning, as defined by health regen.

primaryAttributes.name: Mana
primaryAttributes.description: Magical energy required to use some of the Skills. Beware: Mana is only partially restored every morning, as defined by mana regen.

primaryAttributes.name: Action Points (AP)
primaryAttributes.description: Energy required to use most of the Skills. Fully restored every turn.

primaryAttributes.name: Move Points (MP)
primaryAttributes.description: Distance that can be travelled in a turn: 1 tile = -1MP. Fully restored every turn. Note: some Skills can use MP.

offenseAttributes.name: Damage
offenseAttributes.description: Modifier applied to the damage of every attack.

offenseAttributes.name: Critical
offenseAttributes.description: Chances of an attack dealing a critical hit, dealing additional damage. AoE attacks consider each target separately.

offenseAttributes.name: Resistance Reduction
offenseAttributes.description: Flat reduction applied to the Resistance of targeted enemies. Cannot decrease their Resistance below 0.

offenseAttributes.name: Accuracy
offenseAttributes.description: Flat reduction (or augmentation, if negative) applied to the Dodge of targeted enemies.

defenseAttributes.name: Block
defenseAttributes.description: Negates (flat reduction) a portion of incoming damage.

defenseAttributes.name: Armor
defenseAttributes.description: Protective layer preventing Health loss. Fully restored every turn.

defenseAttributes.name: Resistance (Res.)
defenseAttributes.description: Decreases (or increases if negative) incoming damage. (min -50%)

secondaryAttributes.name: Daily Mana Regen
secondaryAttributes.description: Amount of Mana restored in the morning.

secondaryAttributes.name: Daily Health Regen
secondaryAttributes.description: Amount of Health restored in the morning.

secondaryAttributes.name: Healing Received
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to any kind of health restored to this Hero (final value is rounded down).

secondaryAttributes.name: Reliability
secondaryAttributes.description: Increases the minimum damage of an attack. At 100% the attack will always deal its maximum damage.

secondaryAttributes.name: Critical Power
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the damage of a critical hit.

secondaryAttributes.name: Physical Damage
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the damage of attacks using the Physical Damage type. Physical damage deals 200% damage to Armor.

secondaryAttributes.name: Magic Damage
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the damage of attacks using the Magic Damage type. Magic Damage ignores Half of the target's Resistance.

secondaryAttributes.name: Ranged Damage
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the damage of attacks using the Ranged Damage type. Ranged Damage is inaccurate, increasing the target's Dodge the further they are. This penalty is applied before Accuracy.

secondaryAttributes.name: Skill Range
secondaryAttributes.description: Modifier applied to the range of skills that are tagged as range modifiable.

secondaryAttributes.name: Experience Gain
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to any experience gain.

secondaryAttributes.name: Poison Damage
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the damage of the Poison skill effect. Only affects skills with that effect.

secondaryAttributes.name: Stun Chance
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the stun chance of the Stun skill effect. Only affects skills with that effect.

secondaryAttributes.name: Multi-Hits
secondaryAttributes.description: Modifier applied to the amount of targets of the Multi-Hits skill effect. Only affects skills with that effect.

secondaryAttributes.name: Propagation Bounces
secondaryAttributes.description: Modifier applied to the number of targets of the Propagation skill effect. Only affects skills with that effect.

secondaryAttributes.name: Propagation Damage
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the damage after each bounce (multiplicatively) of the Propagation skill effect. Only affects skills with that effect.

secondaryAttributes.name: Momentum
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the bonus damage of the Momentum skill effect. Only affects skills with that effect.

secondaryAttributes.name: Opportunism
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the damage dealt to targets affected by Negative alterations.

secondaryAttributes.name: Isolation
secondaryAttributes.description: Multiplier applied to the damage dealt to isolated targets (units with no adjacent allies).
